page.title: 07SCHOOLS IN BRANSTON
page.content: Branston has three schools,the Infants (age 5-7), Juniors (7-11) and the Comp -rehensive (11-19).There are 117 child -ren in Infants, 175 in Juniors and 1304 in the Comprehensive. Language, art, reading, maths, music, science and physical and religious education are all taught to the Infants. The school day in the Junior school and the 1st 3 years of the Comprehensive is like this, with French and German and other extra subjects added. In the Comprehensive, children over 14 are given a personal timetable. The Infant school is open 9.15 am - 3.15 pm, the Junior school 9.00 am - 3.30 pm and the Comprehensive 9.10 am - 3.40 pm. At the Comprehensive school, job training and advice on careers is given to the school leavers. Swimming, basketball and tennis are some of the sports taught at the Comprehensive.
